modName: Face Masks of Skyrim - Ghosts Edition Retexture
summary: Ghosts-themed retexture of volvaga0's Face Masks of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3][b][color=#ff0000]Please note that this mod is a texture replacer, not a stand-alone mod; this requires the original Face Masks of Skyrim. Installation of this mod can only be done [/color][i]manually[/i][color=#ff0000].[/color]

[b][color=#ffff00]THIS NOT-FOR PROFIT MOD CAN BE DOWNLOADED AND USED FREE OF CHARGE[/color][/b][/b][/size]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4OkSIdb.jpg[/img]
[b][font=Georgia][size=6]"Time to earn the mask."[/size][/font][/b][/center]
Made and released by demand (as some people were asking about the retex they saw in one of the screenshots), and with volvaga0's blessing this retexture mod replaces the original masks with custom Ghosts versions. Doesn't look out of place, especially when your character's workday is to jump on unsuspecting marks from out of nowhere and slice throats.

[b]Please do note that initially all retextures in this mod are 1024x1024 (1K) in size.[/b]

Any comments are welcome.

[b]Requirements:[/b]
This retexture requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33391]Face Masks of Skyrim[/url] and the Dragonborn DLC.

[b]Manual Installation:[/b]
[list=1][*]Please backup the original textures before installing this mod. The directory/folder is:Â [font=Courier New]data\textures\armor\facemasksofskyrim[/font]
[*]Open the retexture pack using WinRAR or 7zip, then with the Face Masks of Skyrim directory open, click and drag the contents, overwriting the installed textures.
[/list]
[b]Recommended Mod(s):[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3201]Northborn's Fur Hoods[/url]. Comes in 512, 1K and 2K versions.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20415]Brokefoots UNP Mashup[/url]. Mix and match. Dress to kill.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31278]Muddy Skaal Clothing[/url]. Brown, grey, snowy white and black variants available, in both stand-alone (buggy, unfortunately) and replacer versions.

[b]Credits:[/b]
Original: volvaga0 -- Face Masks of Skyrim
Textures: Sourced by someone who PM'd me from out of nowhere.

NOTICE: This mod cannot be uploaded to sites other than Nexus without permission.
author: sa547 and volvaga0
